nodes.text: Star Wars Annual 4 is the fourth annual issue of the Marvel comic book series Star Wars. Written by Cullen Bunn with interior art by Marc Laming, Roland Boschi and Ario Anindito, it was published on May 23, 2018.

Strap in, racing fans — we're going podracing! Bring your betting money, because this is going to be a high-stakes race, with rebel Luke Skywalker, smuggler Sana Starros and even a certain Dark Lord in attendance! PLACE YOUR BETS!

The front matter of Star Wars Annual 4 states that the story takes place before Star Wars 8. However, given the circumstances of Luke Skywalker and Sana Starros' appearances in Star Wars 8 and the previous story arc, Star Wars Annual 4 must be set sometime prior to Star Wars 4.
